description: This file serves as the entry point for a React application, rendering the main App component into the DOM root element. It imports React, ReactDOM, CSS styling, and the main App component, then initializes and renders the application inside a StrictMode wrapper for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React application into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root.
